channel.title: Workshop setup on A Tour of PyTorch 2.0
channel.description: Recent content in Workshop setup on A Tour of PyTorch 2.0

item.title: Free CPU and GPU options
item.description: Install locally If you have a CPU-only or a CPU+GPU laptop or workstation you can install PyTorch 2.0 locally by following these instructions: https://pytorch.org/get-started/locally/ Google Colab Google colab is a free cloud hosted Jupyter based environment. You can get access to GPUs and TPUs to run PyTorch 2.0. Log into Google colab with your google account and open up a new Jupyter Notebook. !pip3 install --upgrade --force-reinstall torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.
